Guillem Vila Siles

Position: PhD student

Education

  • 2022: MSc in Chemistry, Master in Advanced Catalysis and Molecular Modelling (MACMoM), Universitat de Girona, Girona, Catalunya.
  • 2021: BSc in Chemistry, Universitat de Girona (UdG), Girona, Catalunya.

Research Topics

  • A joint PhD thesis between Donostia International Physics Center (DIPC) and Universitat de Girona (UdG), developing new density functional methods for the accurate calculation of the non-linear optical properties using the density functional theory.
